Steps.Message: Update at 22:11 - We're sorry your power has gone off again. We are aware there is an underlying issue causing the recent power cuts. Due to the nature of the electricity network, the heat created by a developing fault can cause a break in a cable to reseal itself, making it difficult to locate. Our engineers are testing our equipment thoroughly to pinpoint the issue, but this kind of problem may interrupt power multiple times before it's possible for us to fix it.

We became aware of a power cut at 20:15. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 22:11 - We're sorry your power has gone off again. We are aware there is an underlying issue causing the recent power cuts. Due to the nature of the electricity network, the heat created by a developing fault can cause a break in a cable to reseal itself, making it difficult to locate. Our engineers are testing our equipment thoroughly to pinpoint the issue, but this kind of problem may interrupt power multiple times before it's possible for us to fix it.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
